overview: Andriy is an entrepreneur and technology specialist who enjoys building new cool services. Andriy has a solid technical background and good innovator skill developed by solving challenging tasks while working on projects in top consultancy companies in Ukraine. Prior to 2009 he worked for a number of consultancy companies (Eleks Software, Softobject, Componence), filled different technical positions, helped to build number of a good teams. In February 2009 he became a Co-Founder and CTO of Address.ua, leading real-estate classifieds aggregation portal with a ranking of classifieds and real estate agents, which also became powerful tool for a real estate agents in Ukraine. In January 2010, Andriy brings people he enjoyed to work with previously to a new team and they started own consultancy company - HelloWebApps.com, which specialized on mobile applications development and web-development. Andriy bacame CEO of HelloWebApps.com
